data.name: We Hidden
data.detailed_description: A 2D Top Down Hide and Seek Strategy game with cute chameleons!. These little guys are always up something so don't let that cute face fool you. Camouflage is one of their specialities. There are two teams. Hiders and Seekers. The Hiders must stay hidden and not get tagged out while the countdown is active. The Seeker will try to tag everyone playing. But the Seeker isn't the only one to be worried about. The chameleons have a natural predator in each environment. Predators are skulking around looking for innocent prey. Try your best to avoid them because you will be knocked out. The biome you decide to play in is filled with mysterious vegetation and relics. The chameleon uses their environment to the best of their ability to stay hidden in such dangerous surroundings.

data.short_description: A 2D Top Down Hide and Seek Strategy game with cute chameleons!.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big sur 11.5.1
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
